name: NOTHING (Ellanthria)
description:
"NOTHING" is a few different things. It's a glitchy mess of a platformer with barely functioning controls. It's the catalyst for headaches in those who stare at it too long. It's a very short game made by an absolute beginner who's never made a game before. More than all these things, however, "NOTHING" is a walk through my mind. The glitches represent my failing psyche. The jumps that hardly register represent my ill health. The word "NOTHING" being repeated represe- oh to hell with it. It's glitchy because it's my first game, but maybe it'll provide you a few minutes of entertainment. 

Made for Ludum Dare 45, my first game jam, in about 20 hours. Should have been 72 hours, but  I kept scrapping my ideas and starting again. In the end, as simple and silly as this game might be, I actually quite like it. 

LUDUM DARE 45

THEME: START WITH NOTHING

PLEASE PLAY THIS GAME IN FULLSCREEN, ELEMENTS MAY BE CUT OFF IF YOU DON'T. THIS GAME WAS DESIGNED SOLELY FOR 1920x1080 RESOLUTIONS.
